examples: Your ability to speak six languages amazes me!

definitions.text: be a mystery or bewildering to
examples: Got me--I don't know the answer!

definitions.text: filled with the emotional impact of overwhelming surprise or shock
examples: an amazed audience gave the magician a standing ovation
I stood enthralled, astonished by the vastness and majesty of the cathedral
astounded viewers wept at the pictures from the Oklahoma City bombing
stunned scientists found not one but at least three viruses
